name: Fire and Ice: The Card Game
name_original: Fire and Ice: The Card Game
description:
This prototype is something that had been created for a Unity class. In it, I was tasked with taking two game mechanics and both recreating and combing them in some way.

This prototype uses the FFXIV black mage astral fire and umbral ice combat mechanic and combines it with a card game. It was created for both educational reasons and because I very much enjoy FFXIV.

I may or may expand upon this at a later point.
